resources.string: This app needs your PAD ID in order to work, so please enter it below.
Please enter in all 9 digits of the PAD ID.
We only support NA right now, so a PAD ID\'s first digit must be 3.
This is what your PAD ID already is.
You have entered in your PAD ID as:
Are you absolutely sure that this is correct?
This PAD ID is already in use.
We are unable to change your PAD ID at this time.
Please enter in your new PAD ID.
